Package com.vmworld.services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomerServices
    Service interface defining customer management operations.
    Promotes loose coupling and abstraction.
    TransactionServices
    Service interface defining transaction operations.
    Abstracts business logic for deposit, withdrawals and queries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomerServicesImpl
    Implementation of CustomerService interface.
    It acts as the service layer, orchestrating business logic by delegating to the repository.
    Delegates persistence tasks to CustomerRepository.
    TransactionServicesImpl
    Implementation of TransactionService interface.
    It orchestrates transaction-related business logic and handles the display logic for the mini-statement.
    Delegates transaction logic to TransactionRepository
